summary: New armor set by Jojjo for females
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center]
[center][font=palatyno linotype]This armor is based on the game diablo,but all mesh and textures are original creations by jojjo.Â [/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#6aa84f][size=4]DESCRIPTION:[/size][/color][/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]Adds a [color=#6aa84f][size=3]female only[/size][/color] set of armor,either crafable,or available in a chest in qasmoke.[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]Crafting under Ebony and upgradable.REQUIRES PERKS!!!![/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]1 torso[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]2 different boots[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]1 gloves[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]1 hood[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]6 colours of wigs[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]The body shape is based on CBBEv3,but it's compatible with any ther body type,and weight slider is not supported.
[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]--------------------------------------------------------------[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]THE ARMOR IS NOT MINE,IT BELONGS TO JOJJO (meshes and base textures).[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]Grace Darkling took care of the project and finished the textures+normalmaps and esp.[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]I simply converted the mesh to be skyrim compatible,and made a wig for the hood.[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]The wig is obviusly not craftable,and can be obtained only in qasmoke or with console[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]THEREFORE I won't support this mod,i'm simply uploading,becuase i'm the only one with some free time.[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]Every complaint or request should be addressed to the original autor,at your own risk.[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]I'd also like to say thanks to KingUggi for exporting the armor from a .3ds max file to a blender compatible one.

[i]
[color=#93c47d][size=4]CANNOT be sold or posted on Creation Club!!!![/size][/color]
[/i][/font]

[font=palatyno linotype][color=#6aa84f]Credits:[/color][/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]Jojjo[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]Gracedarkling[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]Kinguggi[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]LICENSE\LEGAL:[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]Please contact either me, gracedarkling,or jojjo if you want to use this mod.[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]JUST ONE of us is FINE![/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]------------------------------------------------------------------[/font]
[font=palatyno linotype]About Mods Used:[/font]

[font=palatyno linotype]Pictures are from Grace and kinguggi,so dunno.[/font]

[youtube]sEF1iOJqkuI[/youtube]
[font=palatyno linotype]By Gruntlock[/font]

[youtube]AR-X2eCxgrI#t=429[/youtube]
[font=palatyno linotype]By misalen[/font][/center]
author: Jojjo and GraceDarkling and zzjay
